aircraft carrier.definition: A vehicle used to carry planes
hints: These are large boats which help aircrafts take off and land

airplane.definition: A big flying vehicle that can hold a lot of people
hints: They have big wings and make a lot of noise

alarm clock.definition: A special type of clock that reminds you to do things
hints: A lot of people use this to help them wake up in the morning

ambulance.definition: An emergency vehicle for sick and injured people
hints: They have sirens and can often be often found at hospitals

angel.definition: A person who is very good or kind
hints: They have wings and a bright ring on top of their head

animal migration.definition: Something animals do when they have travelled a long distance
hints: Animals do this to find new homes
You often see these either outside or crawling over rotting fruits

anvil.definition: A big iron block which is used to shape pieces of metal
hints: Blacksmiths use these to make swords
A block in Minecraft which lets you combine enchantments

apple.definition: A red (but sometimes green) fruit with seeds in the centre
hints: You may see your teachers at school eating this often

arm.definition: A type of body part attached to peoples upper body
hints: You use this body part everyday when you need to reach for things
They look like paintbrushes

axe.definition: A tool that people use to cut wood
hints: Lumberjacks use these to cut down trees

backpack.definition: Something you wear on your back to help you carry things
hints: You bring this to school everyday to hold your books

banana.definition: A long, yellow and curved fruit
hints: Monkeys like to eat these a lot

bandage.definition: Something you use cover cuts and injuries
hints: Another word for plaster

barn.definition: A big red building found on farms
hints: These are often used to store farm animals

baseball.definition: A sport people play that involves hitting a ball with a bat
hints: This sport is not cricket

baseball bat.definition: A long piece of metal used to hit a baseball
hints: You often see people using these in baseball

basket.definition: Something used to help hold or carry things
hints: These are often made from woven strips of cane or wire

basketball.definition: A sport where people shoot a ball into a hoop
hints: The ball used in this sport is big, orange and has black stripes

bat.definition: An animal with big leathery wings that often live in caves
hints: These animals hang themselves upside down when they sleep

bathtub.definition: A large container you use to clean yourself
hints: This is similar to a shower but instead you fill it with water and sit in it

beach.definition: A place next to the ocean with lots of sand
hints: You'll often find lots of people here during Summer

bear.definition: A big, round and furry animal which walks on four legs
hints: These animals have big teeth and claws

beard.definition: Facial hair that men grown around their jaw and chin
hints: Santa Claus has one of these which is very white and long

bed.definition: A piece of furniture that you use sleep on
hints: Sometimes your mum might tuck you into this before you sleep

bee.definition: A black and yellow insect with wings and a stinger
hints: They make honey

belt.definition: A strip of fabric or leather worn around the waist
hints: These are used to help pants stay in place

bench.definition: A long seat made out of word or stone
hints: You can often find these in parks
These have two pedals and handlebars

binoculars.definition: Something you use to help you see things from very far away
hints: Spies use these to spy on people

bird.definition: An animal which has a beak and wings
hints: You often hear these chirping in your backyard

birthday cake.definition: A food you usually eat on your birthday
hints: This food usually has a lot of cream or icing and sometimes sprinkles

blackberry.definition: A type of fruit which is black and has its seeds on the outside
hints: They look like raspberries but aren't raspberries
A type of berry

book.definition: Something you can read and write with
hints: You use these a lot at school to do work

boomerang.definition: A curved flat piece of wood used for hunting
hints: It returns to you after being thrown

bottlecap.definition: A small circular thing that's used to seal the top of your bottle
hints: You twist these to open and close bottles

bowtie.definition: A piece of clothing with a knot worn around the neck
hints: People wearing suits often wear these as well

bracelet.definition: A fashion item people wear around their wrists
hints: Best friends sometimes make these for each other

brain.definition: Everyone has one of these inside their head
hints: You use this to think

bread.definition: A baked food made from flour, water and yeast
hints: You often eat this with butter or some other kind of spread

bridge.definition: A platform which helps people cross over obstacles
hints: You can find these built over rivers to help people cross

broccoli.definition: A green vegetable with a large stem and a flowering head
hints: They look like mini trees

broom.definition: A tool you use to sweep the floor
hints: Witches fly around on these

bucket.definition: A large container with a handle that is used to hold water
hints: This thing is similar to a basket

bulldozer.definition: A large vehicle used to push things
hints: You can often find these at building sites

bus.definition: A long vehicle with many seats
hints: You might use this to travel to or from school

bush.definition: A green plant with lots of leaves
hints: This is not a tree

butterfly.definition: An insect with pretty (usually orange) wings
hints: These have to hatch from a cocoon

cactus.definition: A green prickly plant with spikes
hints: You can find a lot of these in the desert

cake.definition: A sweet dessert that a lot of people eat on their birthday
hints: This usually has a lot of cream or icing and sometimes sprinkles on top

calculator.definition: A device you use for maths
hints: These can calculate math equations really fast

calendar.definition: Something you use to keep track of the date
hints: Often used to schedule important events

camel.definition: An animal with two big lumps on its back
hints: These animals live in the desert

camera.definition: A device used to take pictures
hints: A lot of phones have these on the back

camouflage.definition: A word to describe something that can't be seen easily
hints: People in the army wear green uniforms to help them do this
Chameleons change colour in order to do this

campfire.definition: A type of fire used to cook in the wild
hints: People like to roast marshmallows over these

candle.definition: A long piece of wax that is lit on fire
hints: People often put these on birthday cakes

cannon.definition: A weapon used to fire big round balls
hints: Pirate ships have a lot of these on the sides
The first type of defense building you can build in Clash of Clans

canoe.definition: A small narrow boat with pointed ends and paddles
hints: Another word for kayak
These are commonly driven around everywhere
Eating this is a good source of Vitamin A
Rabbits like to eat this

castle.definition: An old-fashioned large building with lots of towers and thick walls
hints: These were commonly built for royal families in the mideval times

cat.definition: A common house pet which love catching mice
hints: Meow

ceiling fan.definition: Something attached to the ceiling of buildings used to cool people down
hints: This thing has blades that spin a lot

cello.definition: A type of musical string instrument that is played with a bow
hints: The larger, lower pitched version of the violin

cell phone.definition: A portable device that lets you make calls and send messages
hints: These can also be used to play Clash of Clans
They are often touch screen
This thing usually has four legs and a backrest
These are often seen hanging from the ceiling above staircases
People go here to worship their God

circle.definition: A round shape with a constant diameter
hints: It's very hard to draw one of these perfectly by hand

clarinet.definition: A type of musical woodwind instrument
hints: Squidword from SpongeBob plays this instrument

clock.definition: A device used to tell the time
hints: It makes a 'tick tock' sound

cloud.definition: White things that can be seen floating in the sky
hints: These often have funny shapes and are made of water vapour
Takeaway coffee is stored in this

compass.definition: A device that uses a needle to give directions
hints: Could also be a something that is used to help draw perfect circles

computer.definition: An electronic device which can do a lot of things
hints: They are usually connected to a screen, mouse and keyboard

cookie.definition: A sweet, crunchy food that is usually circle shaped
hints: Santa Claus likes to eat these with milk

cooler.definition: A container used to keep food or bottles cool
hints: These are usually blue and rectangular

couch.definition: A long piece of furniture used for sitting
hints: You will often find these in the living rooms of people's houses

cow.definition: A black and white farm animal which makes milk
hints: Moo

crab.definition: An ocean animal with many legs and a pair of pincers/claws
hints: They have very hard shells and look a bit like spiders
These are used for drawing

crocodile.definition: A big reptile animal that can live on land and in water
hints: They have pointy noses, long tails and very sharp teeth

crown.definition: Something worn on the head by kings and queens
hints: They are usually made out of expensive materials like gold

cruise ship.definition: A large boat that people ride to go on vacation
hints: They usually travel around the ocean for several weeks at a time
You drink things out of it
You often see these on fancy earrings or necklaces

dishwasher.definition: A device used to clean plates and cutlery automatically
hints: You don't have to do the dish washing chores if you have one of these in your kitchen

diving board.definition: People jump off this to dive into swimming pools
hints: They are very flexible and elastic

dog.definition: A common house pet which love playing fetch
hints: Woof

dolphin.definition: A grey sea animal that has a long nose and a round head
hints: They make 'whistle' and 'click' noises

donut.definition: A round pastry food with a hole in the middle
hints: They often come topped with icing, sugar or sprinkles

door.definition: Something you open to get into your house
hints: These can also be locked

dragon.definition: A mythical creature that breathes fire
hints: These creatures can fly and have wings

dresser.definition: A piece of furniture with drawers
hints: Often found in bedrooms and is used by people to get ready

drill.definition: A building tool that can rotate very quickly
hints: These are used to make holes or screw in nails or bolts
These multiple parts like a snare, kick and symbol

duck.definition: A type of bird that can swim and has a flat beak
hints: Quack

dumbbell.definition: A short bar with a weight at each end
hints: These are used to help people exercise and train their muscles

ear.definition: You have one of these on each side of your head
hints: They are used to hear sound

elbow.definition: A joint that connects your forearm and upper arm
hints: It's also sometimes called a 'funnybone'

elephant.definition: A large grey animal with big ears, tusks and a trunk
hints: These animals make loud noises that sound like trumpets

envelope.definition: Something used to hold written letters
hints: You will get these in your mailbox

eraser.definition: A tool used to remove pencil markings
hints: They are often made out of rubber

eye.definition: You have one of these on each side of your face
hints: They are used to see things

eyeglasses.definition: Something people wear to help them see
hints: They come with two lenses
It has your eyes, nose and lips on it

fan.definition: Something used to cool people down
hints: This thing has blades that spin a lot

feather.definition: Soft things that cover the bodies of birds
hints: They were used as pens in the olden days
Sometimes your neighbour might accidentally throw their ball over this

finger.definition: You have 5 of these on each hand
hints: Used to hold and grab things

fire hydrant.definition: A red metal pipe attached to the ground, often seen on public streets
hints: Firefighters attach their fire hoses to these during emergencies

fireplace.definition: A place inside of a house that is used to keep you warm
hints: These places have fires lit in them
These are driven by firefighters

fish.definition: A sea animal with gills and fins
hints: A lot of people eat these

flamingo.definition: A pink bird with a long neck
hints: These birds represent love and passion

flashlight.definition: A handheld tool used to light up areas
hints: Another word for torch

flip flops.definition: A type of shoe that is often worn at the beach or when it is hot
hints: Another word for it is 'jandals'

floor lamp.definition: A light that stands on its own legs
hints: Sometimes these are used as reading lights

flower.definition: A type of plant that blossoms and is pretty
hints: People buy these for special occasions
These are said to have aliens flying in them

foot.definition: You have one of these on each of your legs
hints: They are used to walk and have toes

fork.definition: A piece of cutlery that is used to poke food
hints: They have a handle and multiple spikes

frog.definition: A green animal that can be found hopping around in ponds
hints: They have long tongues that are used to eat flies
They can be seen sitting on lilly pads

frying pan.definition: A heated up tool used in the kitchen to cook food
hints: They are put on top of a stove

garden.definition: A place where you can grow plants, vegetables and fruit
hints: Your house might have one of these in its backyard

garden hose.definition: A long, flexible pipe that shoots out water
hints: These are usually green and are used to water plants and crops

giraffe.definition: A yellow animal that has a really long neck
hints: They have black tongues and like to eat celery

goatee.definition: Facial hair that is grown only on the chin
hints: They look like the hair that goats have on their chin

golf club.definition: A piece of equipment used to play golf
hints: They are used to hit golf balls

grapes.definition: A small round fruit that comes in bunches and grows on a vine
hints: These fruits are used to make wine

grass.definition: A collection of green short plants and narrow leaves
hints: Cows eat this all the time

guitar.definition: A musical string instrument that people strum with their hands
hints: This instrument has a fretted fingerboard

hamburger.definition: A type of food that has two buns, a patty, cheese and vegetables
hints: McDonalds sells a lot of these

hammer.definition: A building tool use to hit nails
hints: The head of this tool is made out of metal

hand.definition: You have one of these attached to each arm
hints: They are used to hold things

harp.definition: A musical string instrument with pedals
hints: Rhymes with tarp

hat.definition: A piece of clothing worn on people's heads
hints: Used to shade peoples heads from the sun

headphones.definition: An electronic device used to listen to things in private
hints: These are worn on your head and cover both your ears

hedgehog.definition: A spiky animal that can be found in your garden
hints: These animals can roll themselves into balls for defense

helicopter.definition: A flying vehicle with big rotating blades on the top
hints: This is sometimes referred to as a 'chopper'

helmet.definition: People wear these to protect their heads
hints: Usually worn when people ride their bikes
Their internal angles add up to 720 degrees

hockey puck.definition: Used to score goals in hockey
hints: They are hit with a hockey stick

hockey stick.definition: A piece of equipment used to play hockey
hints: They are used to hit hockey pucks

horse.definition: A big farm animal that are ridden by humans
hints: They have hair on the back of their necks
Neigh

hospital.definition: A place where sick and injured people stay
hints: Doctors, nurses and surgeons can be found working here

hot air balloon.definition: A basket attached to a large balloon that people ride in
hints: The balloon is filled with heated air

hot dog.definition: A type of food that has a bun and a sausage in the middle
hints: Sometimes they are served with ketchup and mustard

hot tub.definition: A large container filled with hot water that people sit in to relax
hints: A brand called 'Jaccuzi' makes a lot of these

hourglass.definition: A piece of timing equipment made out of two connected glass bulbs
hints: These are filled with sand

house.definition: A type of building that people live in and use as homes
hints: These have a door, a roof and windows

house plant.definition: A plant you keep inside your home
hints: These plants are usually used as house decorations

hurricane.definition: A type of storm with very strong winds
hints: Sometimes it is also known as a 'cyclone'

ice cream.definition: A creamy, sweet food that is eaten for desert
hints: This is eaten a lot in summer because it is cold

jacket.definition: A piece of clothing people usually wear when it is cold
hints: These usually have a zipper

jail.definition: A place where criminals are locked away
hints: Another word for 'prison'

kangaroo.definition: An animal that hops around on two legs and has a pouch to hold its kid
hints: These animals often represent the country Australia

key.definition: Something you use to unlock a door
hints: Sometimes you forget where you put these

keyboard.definition: Something used to type on a computer
hints: Used alongside a computer mouse

knee.definition: A join that connects your lower leg and thigh
hints: You often scrape these when you fall over while running

knife.definition: A piece of equipment used to cut things
hints: Often found a kitchen and is used to prepare all kinds of food

ladder.definition: A long piece of equipment with a series of steps
hints: Used to climb up and down

lantern.definition: A flame or electric bulb that is protected by a clear case
hints: Used to provide light and can be held or hung
It can fold in half

leaf.definition: A plant that can grows on the branches of trees
hints: These turn brown and fall off trees during Autumn

leg.definition: You have two of these on your lower body
hints: They are used to walk, run and jump

light bulb.definition: A device that turns electricity into light
hints: These are round in shape and made out of glass

lighter.definition: A device that creates a small flame
hints: Used to light candles

lighthouse.definition: A tall building found near oceans that helps guide boats during the night
hints: These contain a bright light that spins around

lightning.definition: A bright flash of electricity in the sky
hints: You often hear thunder after seeing this
Its hard to draw these straight without a ruler

lion.definition: A large, strong wild animal that has big teeth, claws and manes
hints: These animals make a roaring sound

lipstick.definition: A common type of makeup used on the mouth
hints: Often times it is a red colour

lobster.definition: A sea animal with big pincers, a hard shell and a tail
hints: These are often eaten at fancy restaurants
These are served on a stick

mailbox.definition: A container used to store mail
hints: These are often numbered for each house

map.definition: Something used to find directions to places
hints: What people had to use before GPS' were invented

marker.definition: A type of pen with a thick ink
hints: Used to draw on whiteboards usually

matches.definition: A collection of sticks with red tips
hints: These are used to light candles

megaphone.definition: A large funnel-shaped device used to make people's voices louder
hints: Often seen used at rallies and protests

mermaid.definition: A mythical creature that is half fish half human
hints: Commonly mentioned in many cultures

microphone.definition: A device that people hold next to their mouth when they sing on stage
hints: These are always used at concerts

microwave.definition: A device which makes food hot again
hints: They make a beeping sound when they've finished heating food up

monkey.definition: An animal that looks like a human and swings on trees
hints: Oo oo ah ah

moon.definition: A giant rock in outerspace that you can see at night
hints: The opposite of the sun

mosquito.definition: An insect with wings that sucks your blood
hints: They cause itchy bites

motorbike.definition: A motor vehicle with two wheels
hints: They make a loud sound often times

mountain.definition: A large elevated portion of land
hints: These often have snow on top of them

mouse.definition: A small animal with whiskers and a long thin tail
hints: These animals like to eat cheese

moustache.definition: Facial hair that grows above the top lip
hints: Mario and Luigi from Nintendo have these

mouth.definition: You use this to eat and speak
hints: Your tongue and teeth are inside of it
Usually used to hold hot liquids like hot chocolate

mushroom.definition: A brown, squishy vegetable that has a stalk and round top
hints: These are considered a fungus
